019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Secret;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
030import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
031import java.security.SecureRandom;
032import java.time.Instant;
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.LinkedList;
035import java.util.List;
036import java.util.Map;
037import java.util.Objects;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.Scanner;
040import java.util.logging.Logger;
041import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
042import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET;
043import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
044import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1SecretStub;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinitionStub;
047import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_LOGIN;
048import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD;
049import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_USER;
050import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY;
051import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.PrepareConsole;
052import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
053import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
054import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.DataPath;
055import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
056import org.jgrapes.core.CompletionLock;
057import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
058import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
059import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
060import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
061import org.jose4j.base64url.Base64;
062
063/**
064 * The properties of the display secret do not only depend on the
065 * VM definition, but also on events that occur during runtime.
066 * The reconciler for the display secret is therefore a separate
067 * component.
068 * 
069 * The reconciler supports the following configuration properties:
070 * 
071 *   * `passwordValidity`: the validity of the random password in seconds.
072 *     Used to calculate the password expiry time in the generated secret.
073 */
074@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.TooManyStaticImports" })
075public class DisplaySecretReconciler extends Component {
076
077    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
078    private int passwordValidity = 10;
079    private final List<PendingGet> pendingPrepares
080        = Collections.synchronizedList(new LinkedList<>());
081
082    /**
083     * Instantiates a new display secret reconciler.
084     *
085     * @param componentChannel the component channel
086     */
087    public DisplaySecretReconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
088        super(componentChannel);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * On configuration update.
093     *
094     * @param event the event
095     */
096    @Handler
097    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
098        event.structured(componentPath())
099            // for backward compatibility
100            .or(() -> {
101                var oldConfig = event
102                    .structured("/Manager/Controller/DisplaySecretMonitor");
103                if (oldConfig.isPresent()) {
104                    logger.warning(() -> "Using configuration with old "
105                        + "path '/Manager/Controller/DisplaySecretMonitor' "
106                        + "for `passwordValidity`, please update "
107                        + "the configuration.");
108                }
109                return oldConfig;
110            }).ifPresent(c -> {
111                try {
112                    if (c.containsKey("passwordValidity")) {
113                        passwordValidity = Integer
114                            .parseInt((String) c.get("passwordValidity"));
115                    }
116                } catch (ClassCastException e) {
117                    logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
118                }
119            });
120    }
121
122    /**
123     * Reconcile. If the configuration prevents generating a secret
124     * or the secret already exists, do nothing. Else generate a new
125     * secret with a random password and immediate expiration, thus
126     * preventing access to the display.
127     *
128     * @param event the event
129     * @param model the model
130     * @param channel the channel
131     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
132     * @throws TemplateException the template exception
133     * @throws ApiException the api exception
134     */
135    public void reconcile(VmDefChanged event,
136            Map<String, Object> model, VmChannel channel)
137            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
138        // Secret needed at all?
139        var display = event.vmDefinition().fromVm("display").get();
140        if (!DataPath.<Boolean> get(display, "spice", "generateSecret")
141            .orElse(true)) {
142            return;
143        }
144
145        // Check if exists
146        var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
147        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
148        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
149            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET + ","
150            + "app.kubernetes.io/instance=" + vmDef.name());
151        var stubs = K8sV1SecretStub.list(channel.client(), vmDef.namespace(),
152            options);
153        if (!stubs.isEmpty()) {
154            return;
155        }
156
157        // Create secret
158        var secret = new V1Secret();
159        secret.setMetadata(new V1ObjectMeta().namespace(vmDef.namespace())
160            .name(vmDef.name() + "-" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET)
161            .putLabelsItem("app.kubernetes.io/name", APP_NAME)
162            .putLabelsItem("app.kubernetes.io/component", COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET)
163            .putLabelsItem("app.kubernetes.io/instance", vmDef.name()));
164        secret.setType("Opaque");
165        SecureRandom random = null;
166        try {
167            random = SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong();
168        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) { // NOPMD
169            // "Every implementation of the Java platform is required
170            // to support at least one strong SecureRandom implementation."
171        }
172        byte[] bytes = new byte[16];
173        random.nextBytes(bytes);
174        var password = Base64.encode(bytes);
175        secret.setStringData(Map.of(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD, password,
176            DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY, "now"));
177        K8sV1SecretStub.create(channel.client(), secret);
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * Prepares access to the console for the user from the event.
182     * Generates a new password and sends it to the runner.
183     * Requests the VM (via the runner) to login the user if specified
184     * in the event.
185     *
186     * @param event the event
187     * @param channel the channel
188     * @throws ApiException the api exception
189     */
190    @Handler
191    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
192    public void onPrepareConsole(PrepareConsole event, VmChannel channel)
193            throws ApiException {
194        // Update console user in status
195        var vmStub = VmDefinitionStub.get(channel.client(),
196            new GroupVersionKind(VM_OP_GROUP, "", VM_OP_KIND_VM),
197            event.vmDefinition().namespace(), event.vmDefinition().name());
198        var optVmDef = vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
199            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
200            status.addProperty("consoleUser", event.user());
201            return status;
202        });
203        if (optVmDef.isEmpty()) {
204            return;
205        }
206        var vmDef = optVmDef.get();
207
208        // Check if access is possible
209        if (event.loginUser()
210            ? !vmDef.conditionStatus("Booted").orElse(false)
211            : !vmDef.conditionStatus("Running").orElse(false)) {
212            return;
213        }
214
215        // Look for secret
216        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
217        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
218            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET + ","
219            + "app.kubernetes.io/instance=" + vmDef.name());
220        var stubs = K8sV1SecretStub.list(channel.client(), vmDef.namespace(),
221            options);
222        if (stubs.isEmpty()) {
223            // No secret means no password for this VM wanted
224            event.setResult(null);
225            return;
226        }
227        var stub = stubs.iterator().next();
228
229        // Get secret and update
230        var secret = stub.model().get();
231        var updPw = updatePassword(secret, event);
232        var updUsr = updateUser(secret, event);
233        if (!updPw && !updUsr) {
234            return;
235        }
236
237        // Prepare wait for confirmation (by VM status change)
238        var pending = new PendingGet(event,
239            event.vmDefinition().displayPasswordSerial().orElse(0L) + 1,
240            new CompletionLock(event, 1500));
241        pendingPrepares.add(pending);
242        Event.onCompletion(event, e -> {
243            pendingPrepares.remove(pending);
244        });
245
246        // Update, will (eventually) trigger confirmation
247        stub.update(secret).getObject();
248    }
249
250    private boolean updateUser(V1Secret secret, PrepareConsole event) {
251        var curUser = DataPath.<byte[]> get(secret, "data", DATA_DISPLAY_USER)
252            .map(b -> new String(b, UTF_8)).orElse(null);
253        var curLogin = DataPath.<byte[]> get(secret, "data", DATA_DISPLAY_LOGIN)
254            .map(b -> new String(b, UTF_8)).map(Boolean::parseBoolean)
255            .orElse(null);
256        if (Objects.equals(curUser, event.user()) && Objects.equals(
257            curLogin, event.loginUser())) {
258            return false;
259        }
260        secret.getData().put(DATA_DISPLAY_USER, event.user().getBytes(UTF_8));
261        secret.getData().put(DATA_DISPLAY_LOGIN,
262            Boolean.toString(event.loginUser()).getBytes(UTF_8));
263        return true;
264    }
265
266    private boolean updatePassword(V1Secret secret, PrepareConsole event) {
267        var expiry = Optional.ofNullable(secret.getData()
268            .get(DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY)).map(b -> new String(b)).orElse(null);
269        if (secret.getData().get(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD) != null
270            && stillValid(expiry)) {
271            // Fixed secret, don't touch
272            event.setResult(
273                new String(secret.getData().get(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD)));
274            return false;
275        }
276
277        // Generate password and set expiry
278        SecureRandom random = null;
279        try {
280            random = SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong();
281        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) { // NOPMD
282            // "Every implementation of the Java platform is required
283            // to support at least one strong SecureRandom implementation."
284        }
285        byte[] bytes = new byte[16];
286        random.nextBytes(bytes);
287        var password = Base64.encode(bytes);
288        secret.setStringData(Map.of(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD, password,
289            DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY,
290            Long.toString(Instant.now().getEpochSecond() + passwordValidity)));
291        event.setResult(password);
292        return true;
293    }
294
295    private boolean stillValid(String expiry) {
296        if (expiry == null || "never".equals(expiry)) {
297            return true;
298        }
299        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CloseResource", "resource" })
300        var scanner = new Scanner(expiry);
301        if (!scanner.hasNextLong()) {
302            return false;
303        }
304        long expTime = scanner.nextLong();
305        return expTime > Instant.now().getEpochSecond() + passwordValidity;
306    }
307
308    /**
309     * On vm def changed.
310     *
311     * @param event the event
312     * @param channel the channel
313     */
314    @Handler
315    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidSynchronizedStatement")
316    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, Channel channel) {
317        synchronized (pendingPrepares) {
318            String vmName = event.vmDefinition().name();
319            for (var pending : pendingPrepares) {
320                if (pending.event.vmDefinition().name().equals(vmName)
321                    && event.vmDefinition().displayPasswordSerial()
322                        .map(s -> s >= pending.expectedSerial).orElse(false)) {
323                    pending.lock.remove();
324                    // pending will be removed from pendingGest by
325                    // waiting thread, see updatePassword
326                    continue;
327                }
328            }
329        }
330    }
331
332    /**
333     * The Class PendingGet.
334     */
335    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
336    private static class PendingGet {
337        public final PrepareConsole event;
338        public final long expectedSerial;
339        public final CompletionLock lock;
340
341        /**
342         * Instantiates a new pending get.
343         *
344         * @param event the event
345         * @param expectedSerial the expected serial
346         */
347        public PendingGet(PrepareConsole event, long expectedSerial,
348                CompletionLock lock) {
349            super();
350            this.event = event;
351            this.expectedSerial = expectedSerial;
352            this.lock = lock;
353        }
354    }
355}
